DLG 18
what are you doing with that royal knive? you do not understand mortal.

DLG a
its sad that im lost here , child. though im a moth with a pair of strong wings , i cannot fly.

DLG b
Rest in peace. a soldier who tried to destroy the oracle.

DLG c
rest in peace, the vilager who helped all.

DLG d
rest in peace, Queen Methres the 3rd. we will miss our queen.

DLG e
rest in peace , the soldier who guards the queen

DLG f
hey! this is the game devs house! hi there!

DLG g
i miss my daddy so much...

DLG h
its alright my child. daddys in a better place.

DLG i
to the moth kingdom

DLG j
welcome to the house of exodus. we praise exodus as our goddess , you can see the statue near the castle of mothius , our mother.

DLG k
i praise to my one and only lord.

DLG l
oracle , the goddess of suns has cursed us. oh exodus. please send mercy to us.

DLG m
i will only accept you , exodus my lord!

DLG n
the house of exodus

DLG o

DLG p

DLG q

DLG r

DLG x
Hello, mortal human. i am motheus, the mother of moths. we are dying from a curse by oracle. we cannot fly , and we are starving. will you help us? if you walk away from this place , then thats a no. if you walk to the intergalactic moth door , thats a yes.

DLG z
hello , mortal creature. i am the oracle. what do you want from me?

END 0
you left them , and time to time , the moth has been decreased. you went to the kingdom again , only to realise that the kingdom has became ruins.

END 1
you left the oracle , and return to your world. the next day , you went to the kingdom again. but the kingdom has become ruins now.

END 2
you sliced the oracles eye. the oracle screams in pain , and everything went black. you heard a voice saying "thank you"
